{{Infobox battle item |name = Soul Dew |image = [[File:Soul Dew.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Soul Dew''. |location =
*[[Hoenn]] }} == Description == The '''Soul Dew''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Latias.png|30px]] Latias and [[File:Latios.png|30px]] Latios. == Details == Raises attack of Latias and Latios by 50%. == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Hoenn]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Latias and Latios ''(Base 1/512 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} '''*Note:''' Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Soul Dew to 1/341.
